en.name: Astral Vulture’s Crimson Plumage
en.passiveDescription: For 12s after triggering a Swirl reaction, ATK increases by {{24//30//36//42//48%}}. In addition, when 1/2 or more characters in the party are of a different Elemental Type from the equipping character, the DMG dealt by the equipping character’s Charged Attacks is increased by {{20%/48%//25%/60%//30%/72%//35%/84%//40%/96%}} and Elemental Burst DMG dealt is increased by {{10%/24%//12.5%/30%//15%/36%//17.5%/42%//20%/48%}}.
